lead_paragraph: Credit Suisse has seen an unexpected rise in its mergers-and-acquisitions fortunes, emerging from the financial crisis's shake-up of the industry near the top of the leagues, The Wall Street Journal reported.
snippet: Credit Suisse has seen an unexpected rise in its mergers-and-acquisitions fortunes, emerging from the financial crisis's shake-up of the industry near the top of the leagues, The Wall Street Journal reported.

headline.main: Unexpected M&A Gains for Credit Suisse

abstract: Credit Suisse has seen an unexpected rise in its mergers-and-acquisitions fortunes, emerging from the financial crisis's shake-up of the industry near the top of the leagues, The Wall Street Journal reported.
